welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tanjungpinang, the charming city known for its rich history, diverse culture, and beautiful coastal scenery. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this vibrant city has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Akau Potong Lembu (PSP Street Food)
restaurants.description: Akau Potong Lembu (PSP Street Food) is a food truck located in Tanjungpinang.
restaurants.address: Jl. Potong Lembu, Tanjungpinang, Kepulauan Riau 29111
